alert.note: Alert for Yell (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 05 at 1:42AM CDT until April 05 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 AM CDT FOR WESTERN CONWAY...NORTHEASTERN YELL AND SOUTHEASTERN POPE COUNTIES... At 142 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Galla Creek WMA, or 7 miles southeast of Russellville, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Russellville... Morrilton... Dardanelle... Atkins... Pottsville... Hector... Carden Bottoms... Happy Bend... Hattieville... Petit Jean State Park... Galla Creek WMA... Taral... Lake Dardanelle... Appleton... Holla Bend... Blackwell... Economy... Caglesville... Oak Grove in Pope County... Lakeview in Yell County... TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 AM CDT for central Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
